column4: i have radeon 9600. these instructions worked for me  http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Intrepid_Installation_Guide#The_open_source_drivers
this page https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI is not updated for itnrepid and says nothing about the 4870
do the open source drivers support the 4870?
